title: Tesla's Eye Popping Record
itunes:title: Tesla's Eye Popping Record
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Editor for Global Business News Rick Schine on Scientists Are Bending RNA to Get From Vaccines to Cancer Drugs. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne on ESG Whistleblower Calls Out Wall Street. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull on Tesla Delivers ‘Eye Popping’ 241,300 Cars in Record Quarter. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Kurt Wagner on Facebook Falls After Whistleblower Speaks Out Against Harms. And we Drive to the Close with Ed Rosenberg, Head of ETFs at American Century Investments.

Hosted by Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
